roleset.name: enter suddenly

example.name: active
example.text: Police in Prague raided an international meeting on human rights, detaining Czechoslovakia's former foreign minister, Jiri Hajak, and 14 other activists.

detaining Czechoslovakia's former foreign minister, Jiri Hajak, and 14 other activists

example.name: passive
example.text: [Luxurious homes and ranches]-1 have been raided *trace*-1 by the military authorities, and sophisticated and powerful communications equipment have been seized.
